website_summaries.verdict: Boosts the natural production of collagen in your skin and improves the general appearance of how it looks.
pros: CPR-75 Technology is proven to double skin's natural collagen-building power
Reduces the appearance of fine lines
Skin becomes smoother and more supple in just four weeks
cons: Some users received watered-down formulas that were ineffective

customer_reviews.title: Soft as Silk
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like silk. My skin feels so wonderful prior to makeup application. Wish I could take a bath in it!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla R Lucero

customer_reviews.title: they both love them nice quality
customer_reviews.text: i'm using this for years. this time i'm getting this for my mom and aunt. they both love them nice quality, you'll see after you put it on your skin. your skin will tell you the truth
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hong

customer_reviews.title: Used Estee Lauder for years.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product at the store and it is excellent. It is much less expensive through Amazon. I have used Estee Lauder products for years and feel they are excellent and keep my skin looking good for my age.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Mills

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - FAKE!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t even deserve 1 star! I have been using this product for years now and can tell you this is 100% FAKE! Definitely a cheaper bottle, won’t pump out properly and cheap lotion inside. This fake product has same consistency as Oil of Olay lotion but tackier. The real product should feel like velvet on your skin! I am returning for refund and will purchase directly from Estée Lauder from now on...lesson learned!!
customer_reviews.author: StefB

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best in anti-aging serums, hands-down. I've bought and tried EVERYTHING out there at EVERY price. I always come back to Perfectionist. Buy it. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl in VA

customer_reviews.title: Perfection serum does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: My skin feel hydrated and smoother after applying the serum.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great I just apply it in certain areas and it helps lift and you don't need much.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Osullivan

customer_reviews.title: much less cream than expected
customer_reviews.text: The lid had cream around it straight out of the box. The contents seem to be barely 2/3rds full right out of the bottle and the lid will not close tightly. Not sure if this is how este lauder does now, but expected a full bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: First time Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife and it is the only thing I ever purchased from Amazon (I buy every week) that we were disappointed in. My wife said the product was dried up and she threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE B.

customer_reviews.title: Youth in a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this (and its previous iteration, Fruition) since my mid-30s. People commonly assume I'm 10 year's younger (or more) than I am.
customer_reviews.author: John Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite face creams. Received quickly from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Used if for years.  Makes my .ca e ceel good
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the price going up so high. Product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley  Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Face product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on myFace and love this product! Most important for my daily care!
customer_reviews.author: JEANNETTE B. SCHACHT

customer_reviews.title: Best ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best ever ... I use it regularly and my skin is always smooth. Great to be used before putting make up on.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is fake! Cheap lotion in a look a like bottle. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Christina D. Green

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this product for quite a while and love it. It was a little cheaper on line
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for quite a while and love it. It was a little cheaper on line, so that's why I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: SC Pat

customer_reviews.title: ... weeks and it does seem to be doing an excellent job of reducing/smoothing the wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Estee Lauder Perfectionist Wrinkle Cream for a few weeks and it does seem to be doing an excellent job of reducing/smoothing the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Stone

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several yrs. and will not use anything else. It makes my skin so soft and since i have dry skin it also has lots of moisturizer in it. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene L. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Just what I ordered. Will order again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's always good to my skin. This is the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Alyn PK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Although this is an expensive product, it is worth the $$. It makes my faces soft and smooth. I have been using it about 2 years and plan to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My skin instantly feels smooth and soft after putting this on... Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TQK

customer_reviews.title: Estee Lauder provided a refund for this product
customer_reviews.text: Estee Lauder provided a refund for this product and another one I bought from their website. This product made my wrinkles worse. Don't know if it takes time to see results, but very embarrassing to use product since it just wasn't right for my skin. Unfortunately I bought this on amazon and didn't get item refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Holrider

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin smooth
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product several years ago and cannot stop it now! One of the best products I found on the market to keep my skin smooth and looking younger.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Campuzano

customer_reviews.title: Better than La Prarie
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it! I've tried so many different products ranging from Olay all the way to La Prarie. None of them have given me the kind of results as this serum. I'm in my 20s and just started seeing the first signs of smile lines. After a couple of months of using this product, my skin has a beautiful glow and the smile lines have completely gone away. Couldn't be any happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: imitation
customer_reviews.text: comes without box and the product after 3 weeks had no effect, buy one box and if it works is false.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro E

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very thin liquid, won't get it again. I'll stick to Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: AC Power Services

customer_reviews.title: Bottle spring broken
customer_reviews.text: The bottle arrived with the spring broken, which is very frustrating as I have to open it in order to use the serum and thus I am using a bigger amount than by using the normal way of pressing it. I am using this product for many years.
customer_reviews.author: hana.cytron

customer_reviews.title: A side by side comparison showed that the product sold here is at best watered down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Wife at Christmas and she was on her last jar so she went to a local store (starts with M end in ys) and bought another jar. Let me warn you the item sold is not what you would get from a reputable retailer. A side by side comparison showed that the product sold here is at best watered down. She noticed marked improvement over the past few days and has been using a fraction of what she was using with this forgery. Do yourself a favor and spend a few extras $ on the real thing, you are just wasting your money here. Caveat emptor, next time I will be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I beleive the produc is fake. I have been using Estee Lauder Perfectionist for the past 15 years. I still have my previous bottle so I have compared the two products. The one I just purchased smells like body milk while the one I had at home have the usual characteristics nice smell of Perfectionist. I dont know how it is posible since the bottle seems normal.. but the product inside is definitely not perfectionist.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Skin friendly, works and makes your face feel soft.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I have sensitive skin and this doesn’t make me red or sore or broken out. It really makes your skin feel soft and helps minimize the age lines. I discounted one star for the price but it is more money at the big department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Chris. B

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the real product from Estee Lauder. I have been using this product for many, many years and the texture, smell, etc. is completely different. Unfortunately I waited too long to return it. But at least I can warn others not to purchase from this seller. Very disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: JP7042

customer_reviews.title: Container opened and pump didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Container was opened and pump didn't work. What is inside doesn't look or feel like what I ordered. This is a lesson learned, only buy from a retailer!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O Hughes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was filled up with something else - would not buy this ever again
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to keep moister in the air. My sinuses mess up at night. When I plugged this up there was so much steam. I love it. I love the red light on it that tells you when it’s time to put more water in it. The water lasts for awhile. The blue light makes the room very cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Sasa

customer_reviews.title: My wife swears by this.
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by this stuff. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years, it does not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Paula Tipton

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: regular lotion place in the bottle. don't order from Jellybean company.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrinkle Cream
customer_reviews.text: My wife thinks this stuff is the greatest thing since popcorn! Yes, she rants and raves about it, so it must be good. She has been using this for a long time and swears by it, even though I think it is pricey. As they say, a woman's vanity has few boundaries, but I'm a man, so what do I know?
customer_reviews.author: John E. De Vous

customer_reviews.title: #1 skin product
customer_reviews.text: Best skin care product I've used for smoothing out fine lines and wrinkles. Also minimizes large pores. Leaves my skin looking refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: sheila phillips

product_meta.title: Estee Lauder Perfectionist [CP+R] Wrinkle Lifting/Firming Serum (For All Skin Types) 50ml/1.7oz
product_meta.description: A high-performance anti-aging serumDeveloped with revolutionary CPR-75 Technology proven to double skin's natural collagen building powerInstantly plumps & smoothes out fine lines & wrinkles Reveals a suppler firmer fresher clearer re-contoured & younger looking complexion Perfect for all skin typesTo use: Apply to cleansed & toned face under moisturizer focusing on your deepest wrinkles
